card_text: Gains 300 ATK for each monster your opponent controls, during your turn only. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ancient Warriors - Valiant Zhang De" once per turn.$N●If you control 2 or more "Ancient Warriors" monsters: You can Special Summon this card from your hand.$N●If your opponent controls more monsters than you do: You can activate this effect; this card can make up to 2 attacks on monsters during each Battle Phase this turn.
